name: Shoot Trek (FREE)
description:
Shoot

 Trek is a front-view space shooter, that periodically spawns enemy ships that must be destroyed. 

Along the way, there will be power-ups/temporary ability crates spawned as well. All sounds and music were downloaded from trekcore.com/audio. All ship models were built by me, based on Star Trek designs (therefore, not original).

Instructions:

Download the .zip file, unzip, then select "ShootTrek.exe" to play the game.

Controls:

- Movement: WASD

- Fire Weapon: Space bar

- Throttle Down/Up: -/=

- Exit Game: Escape

I have just completed the "Create with Code 1" portion of the Unity Junior Programmer Pathway (3 weeks into learning game development). Feedback is most appreciated!
